name: Flappy Clone (Jamie Tumalty (LoneWolfCoder))
description:
A Flappy Bird Clone I developed using Unity, to help me get used to the engine and learn more about it.

Controls:

  • Tap or press space to jump
  • Use left/right arrow keys to select bird, in the menu

Settings:

VolumeAdjust the volume of the game.Game SpeedSpeed of the game. Modes are: Slow, Normal, Fast, and Insane.GravityStrength of the gravity in game. Weak gravity causes the bird to rise further with each jump and fall slower, whereas Strong gravity does the opposite. Shift PipesWhen On, pipes will move up or down when in range.Mirror ModeFlips the camera, allowing the game to be played flipped on the Horizontal or Vertical axis, or both.
